import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './Productdisplay.css'; import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png'; import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png'; import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext'; const Productdisplay = (props) => { const { product } = props; const {addTpCart } =useContext(ShopContext); return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
This is description

Select Size

S
M
L
XL

Category : WOMEN, T-SHIRT, CROP, TOP

); } export default Productdisplay;
